name: Dome Defender
description:
Dome Defender is a single-player turn-based puzzle strategy game where you use space-age tools to catch predators and send them back to the correct habitats.

In this game, you are one of the first colonists on Mars. Your job is to look after the eco-domes that grow wildlife and vegetation for the colonists, but there's been a breach! Now the predators are all in the wrong eco-domes and it's your job to put them back where they belong. Act quickly, if the predators kill all of the prey on the board, the ecosystem will be doomed.
